CustomField.description: Type of the component. Clause considers clause document, Attachment (Id) considers a hardcoded attachment id, Attachment (Object/Field) considers attachment id in a field, Parent (Object/Field) considers the first attachment in the parent represented by the field, Content (Object/Field) considers the raw content of that field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Clause = clause document, Attachment (Id) = hardcoded attachment id, Attachment (Object/Field) = attachment id in a field, Parent (Object/Field) = first attachment in the parent represented by the field, Content (Object/Field) = raw content of the field.
CustomField.label: Component Type
